imgDesc.text: Daises of Day and Daises of Night will be filled up during their respective "day" and "night" times. Get close to them to operate them. However, their states will reset when you switch between Evernight and Whitenight.

Daises of Day and Daises of Night will be filled up during their respective "day" and "night" times. Get close to them to operate them. However, their states will reset when you switch between Evernight and Whitenight.
